text: Ahha!!
I figured it out <@UDB26738Q> and <@UH24GRBLL>
share it :smile:

there was an errant line in `~/.profile`  which was resetting the path. As I use zsh, I didn’t notice it. And it was syntactically correct. But as julia seems to invoke bash with shell commands, it was reading the `.profile` and munging the `PATH` environment.
